parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new DialogRow &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the DialogRow.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the DialogRow with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the DialogRow with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the DialogRows within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The DialogRow, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: DialogRow, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The DialogRow, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: DialogRow, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first DialogRow in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last DialogRow in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle DialogRow in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the DialogRow with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the DialogRow that follows the desired DialogRow.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the DialogRow whose index follows the specified DialogRow in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The DialogRow whose index comes before the desired DialogRow.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any DialogRow in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every DialogRow in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the DialogRow.
Returns the DialogRow with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
